thread.title: The 17 Worst Things All Little Sisters Who Grew Up With An Older Brother Had To Deal With
thread.title_full: The 17 Worst Things All Little Sisters Who Grew Up With An Older Brother Had To Deal With

author: Crystal Ro
title: The 17 Worst Things All Little Sisters Who Grew Up With An Older Brother Had To Deal With
text:
View this image › 
lexameng / Via instagram.com This actually hurt, and also…WTF?!
ID: 10628704 2. Having your Barbies stolen, destroyed, and used in some elaborate ~battle~… View this image › 
thinkibee / Via instagram.com On a mission with G.I. Joe.
ID: 10628707 3. …and having other toys become part of strange experiments. View this image › 
kb91810 / Via instagram.com Introducing: The Amazing Anna and Incredible Elsa, everyone!
ID: 10628809 4. Finding your favorite dolls in places you definitely did not leave them… View this image › 
matchesmalone47 / Via instagram.com Yuck.
ID: 10628834 5. …and ruined in general. View this image › 
whimsy.fox.nursery / Via instagram.com ID: 10630993 6. Never getting a chance to watch the shows YOU wanted to after school. View this image › 
kimnelx / Via instagram.com I know more about Star Trek than I care too, TBH.
ID: 10628703 7. Having to act as your brother’s personal assistant. View this image › 
Twitter: @comedyortruth UGH.
ID: 10630582 8. Getting this ~wonderful~ surprise when you went to pee in the middle of the night. View this image › 
Twitter: @mee_mee_5 Close the damn lid, please!
ID: 10628863 9. Being the victim of this annoying AF older brother tactic on a daily basis. View this image › 
brandy.ryleigh / Via instagram.com “ M m! ”
ID: 10628710 10. And always having to rely on your parents to stop a fight. View this image › 
Twitter: @NADlNEROMAN Ye . 
ID: 10630150 11. Secretly crushing on your brother’s friends, but embarrassing yourself every time they came over. View this image › 
Twitter: @krishithink ::Locks self in room forever::
ID: 10628719 12. And then finding out YOUR friends are crushing on your brother. View this image › 
Twitter: @_alizejac07 ::Vomits forever::
ID: 10628729 13. Hovering for what felt like FOREVER because your bro prolonged his “turn” while playing games. View this image › 
tvd84 / Via instagram.com “Just another minute…”
ID: 10630301 14. Then struggling to get your brother to play the games you ACTUALLY wanted to. View this image › 
buster.skeeziks / Via instagram.com “But I can’t play The Game of Life BY MYSELF!!!”
ID: 10630462 15. Being sat, and farted, on, like… A LOT. View this image › 
onsizzle.com Double rude.
ID: 10629992 16. Not being able to enjoy a meal a second time. View this image › 
Twitter: @emily_davis14 Yeah, no, that’s okay, I didn’t want the rest of my fries anyway…
ID: 10629148 17. And finally, always having to be the “lab rat” whenever your brother learned a new ~trick~. View this image › 
caelyn.photography.foster / Via instagram.com “Wanna play 52 card pick up?!” S GH. 
ID: 10628769 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
